Study.Citation:
Levenson, M.R., Kiehl, K.A, Fitzpatrick, C.M. (1995). Assessing
psychopathic attributes in a noninstitutionalized population. Journal
of Personality and Social Psychology, 68, 151-158.

License.en: Freely available for research purposes (verify with original publication)
License.de: Frei verfügbar für Forschungszwecke (mit Originalpublikation überprüfen)

Instructions.en: Please read each statement and select the response that best describes you.
Instructions.de: Bitte lesen Sie jede Aussage und wählen Sie die Antwort, die Sie am besten beschreibt.

Description.en: Success is based on survival of the fittest; I am not concerned about the losers
Description.de: Success is based on survival of the fittest; I am not concerned about the losers

Description.en: For me, what's right is whatever I can get away with
Description.de: For me, what's right is whatever I can get away with

Description.en: In today's world, I feel justified in doing anything I can get away with to succeed
Description.de: In today's world, I feel justified in doing anything I can get away with to succeed

Description.en: My main purpose in life is getting as many goodies as I can
Description.de: My main purpose in life is getting as many goodies as I can

Description.en: Making a lot of money is my most important goal
Description.de: Making a lot of money is my most important goal

Description.en: I let others worry about higher values; my main concern is with the bottom line
Description.de: I let others worry about higher values; my main concern is with the bottom line

Description.en: People who are stupid enough to get ripped off usually deserve it
Description.de: People who are stupid enough to get ripped off usually deserve it

Description.en: Looking out for myself is my top priority
Description.de: Looking out for myself is my top priority

Description.en: I tell other people what they want to hear so that they will do what I want them to do
Description.de: I tell other people what they want to hear so that they will do what I want them to do

Description.en: I often admire a really clever scam
Description.de: I often admire a really clever scam

Description.en: I enjoy manipulating other people's feelings
Description.de: I enjoy manipulating other people's feelings
